name: Trash Sweeper (Slime Arts)
description:
On a trekking mountain, clean as much trash as you can and save our environment.

Move the player and collect the trash items and give it to the cleaners.

Cleaners will give you a trash bag that contains all the trash items you have given.

Take the trash bag and go put it in the Trash Van in a limited time.

Try To beat Your Highscore and challenge your friends :).
